content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal (position y)

### Iron plate factory at position(z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to craft without sufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, to craft iron-gear-wheels, you need at least 2 iron-plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
